ComicInfo.Title: Training the Dog; Cracked Interviews the Wedding King; Rock and Roll Your Eyeballs Out; How to Improve Your... Ah.. Ah... Memory; How Adults Drive Kids Nuts; Super People; One Day in the North Woods; Colonel Jim Dandy's Guide to Good Manners for Discriminatin' Cowpokes 'n' Buckaroos; Cracked's Inventory of Personal Spending Habits; The Return of Mork and Mindy
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A lumberjack carves a tree down into a toothpick.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:36:14. [Issue ID 250524]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Sam Whitehead,Don Orehek,Bill Ward,John Severin,Howard Nostrand,Warren Sattler,Su Gumen
ComicInfo.Inker: Sam Whitehead,Don Orehek,Bill Ward,John Severin,Howard Nostrand,Warren Sattler,Su Gumen
